entity.name: Innovation Cascade
entity.definition: The compounding breakthrough sequence enabled by functional hybrids: (1) Scalable quantum computing (2030-32) → drug discovery, materials simulation, optimization; (2) Grid-scale fusion power (2035-40s) → unlimited clean energy, desalination, climate stabilization; (3) Quantum sensing (2038-45) → health monitors, earthquake prediction, precision navigation; (4) Ambient superconductors (early 2040s) → zero-loss transmission, maglev, medical imaging; (5) Subluminal warp propulsion (2045-50) → solar system access, asteroid mining, space manufacturing. 'Each breakthrough required the others.'
entity.purpose: Shows how functional hybrids enable civilization-scale innovation
entity.first_mention: Appendix, 'The Physics Cascade That Changed Everything' section

additions.rationale: Central speculative framework showing ultimate mechanism payoff

key_themes: Functional hybrids enabling sustained breakthrough innovation
Innovation cascade: quantum → fusion → sensing → superconductors → warp
